Promote

Use the Promote dialog box (Actions | Promotion Group | Promote) to promote selected items to the next level in the promotion model hierarchy. You can promote selected versioned files, projects, or project databases.

Field Descriptions

General Tab
Promote From Select the name of promotion group assigned to the selected items.
OK to move across branches Select to allow reassignment of a promotion group across branches. Otherwise, the promotion will fail if a revision on another branch is already assigned the next highest promotion group.
Include files in subprojects This field is available only when the selected item is a project or project database. Select to promote all projects and files included in the project or project database.
Selected Files Tab
File list Review the selected files or projects that you want to promote to the next level.
Properties button Click to display information on the item selected. If you select a project, you can view project information and workspace settings. If you select a versioned file, you can view versioned file information and workspace settings.

See Also
